languages.text: "Вам необходимо как можно скорее воспитать в себе настоящего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и восстановить контроль над протекторатом фон Валанциус. Все — от этого корабля до самых дальних ваших планет — должно работать, как части одной машины, благословленной лучшими {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g}. Ситуация у вас не самая завидная, тем бдительнее надо быть! Даже малый недосмотр может вырасти в огромную проблему, так что будьте внимательны и строги — и к себе, и к другим!"

traits.locale_text: "Вам необходимо как можно скорее воспитать в себе настоящего Вольного Торговца и восстановить контроль над торговой империей фон Валанциус. Все — от этого корабля до самых дальних ваших планет — должно работать, как части одной машины, благословленной лучшими техножрецами. Ситуация у вас не самая завидная, тем бдительнее надо быть! Даже малый недосмотр может вырасти в огромную проблему, так что будьте бдительны и строги — и к себе, и к другим!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"
languages.original_text: "Вам необходимо как можно скорее воспитать в себе настоящего {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} и восстановить контроль над протекторатом фон Валанциус. Все — от этого корабля до самых дальних ваших планет — должно работать, как части одной машины, благословленной лучшими {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецами{/g}. Ситуация у вас не самая завидная, тем бдительнее надо быть! Даже малый недосмотр может вырасти в огромную проблему, так что будьте внимательны и строги — и к себе, и к другим!"

Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest Tech-Priests. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be vigilant and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “您必须成为一位真正的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，尽快恢复对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地的控制。您身边的一切，无论是这艘船，还是您最偏远的行星，都必须像经过最优秀的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}祝福过的零件一样，在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝这台机器上共同运作。您的位置并不令人羡慕，因为这意味着您必须始终保持警惕！哪怕是最微小的疏忽，最终也会酿成严重的后果！因此，您一定要保持警惕，严于律己，也严于律人！”
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: “您必须成为一位真正的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}，尽快恢复对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝属地的控制。您身边的一切，无论是这艘船，还是您最偏远的行星，都必须像经过最优秀的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}祝福过的零件一样，在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝这台机器上共同运作。您的位置并不令人羡慕，因为这意味着您必须始终保持警惕！哪怕是最微小的疏忽，最终也会酿成严重的后果！因此，您一定要保持警惕，严于律己，也严于律人！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "You must become a true Rogue Trader and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest Tech-Priests. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

languages.text: «Debe convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de verdad y retomar el control del protectorado von Valancius lo antes posible. Todo, desde esta nave hasta los planetas más lejanos, debe funcionar como si fuera una única máquina bendecida por los mejores {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}. Aunque su posición dista mucho de ser envidiable, ¡eso solo significa que debe prestar atención! Si el más mínimo descuido puede convertirse en un gran problema, ¡debe ser atent{mf|o|a} y exigente con usted mism{mf|o|a} y con los demás!».
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: «Debe convertirse en {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de verdad y retomar el control del protectorado von Valancius lo antes posible. Todo, desde esta nave hasta los planetas más lejanos, debe funcionar como si fuera una única máquina bendecida por los mejores {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g}. Aunque su posición dista mucho de ser envidiable, ¡eso solo significa que debe prestar atención! Si el más mínimo descuido puede convertirse en un gran problema, ¡debe ser atent{mf|o|a} y exigente con usted mism{mf|o|a} y con los demás!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたは真の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}となり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の支配権をできるだけ早く取り戻さなければなりません。すべてが…この船から最も遠くの惑星に至るまで…最高の{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}によって祝福された一つの機械の部品として動かねばならないのです。あなたの立場はうらやましいものには程遠いですが、だからこそ用心深くあらねばなりません！些細な見落としでも大きな問題に発展する可能性があるのです。己に対しても他人に対しても、用心深く、厳格であるのです！」
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは真の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}となり、フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領の支配権をできるだけ早く取り戻さなければなりません。すべてが…この船から最も遠くの惑星に至るまで…最高の{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}によって祝福された一つの機械の部品として動かねばならないのです。あなたの立場はうらやましいものには程遠いですが、だからこそ用心深くあらねばなりません！些細な見落としでも大きな問題に発展する可能性があるのです。己に対しても他人に対しても、用心深く、厳格であるのです！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr müsst so schnell wie möglich {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin}{/g} werden und die Kontrolle über das Protektorat von Valancius zurückerlangen. Alles, von diesem Schiff bis hin zu den entferntesten Eurer Planeten, muss als Teil einer einzigen Maschine zusammenarbeiten, welche von den besten {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} gesegnet wurde. Eure Position ist gewiss nicht beneidenswert, doch das bedeutet nur, dass Ihr wachsam sein müsst! Selbst der kleinste Fehler könnte zu einem riesigen Problem heranwachsen. Ihr müsst also wachsam und präzise sein — Euch selbst und anderen gegenüber!"
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst so schnell wie möglich {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|zum Freihändler|zur Freihändlerin}{/g} werden und die Kontrolle über das Protektorat von Valancius zurückerlangen. Alles, von diesem Schiff bis hin zu den entferntesten Eurer Planeten, muss als Teil einer einzigen Maschine zusammenarbeiten, welche von den besten {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} gesegnet wurde. Eure Position ist gewiss nicht beneidenswert, doch das bedeutet nur, dass Ihr wachsam sein müsst! Selbst der kleinste Fehler könnte zu einem riesigen Problem heranwachsen. Ihr müsst also wachsam und präzise sein — Euch selbst und anderen gegenüber!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous devez devenir {mf|un|une} véritable {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} et reprendre le contrôle du protectorat von Valancius au plus vite. Toutes les ressources à votre disposition, de ce vaisseau aux plus lointaines de vos planètes, doivent travailler de concert, comme les composants d'une même machine bénie par les plus grands {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}. Vous occupez une position qui n'a rien d'enviable et requiert une vigilance de tous les instants ! Il vous faut être {mf|attentif|attentive} et vous montrer {mf|exigeant|exigeante} envers tout le monde, vous y compris, car la moindre négligence pourrait prendre des proportions critiques. »
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez devenir {mf|un|une} véritable {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} et reprendre le contrôle du protectorat von Valancius au plus vite. Toutes les ressources à votre disposition, de ce vaisseau aux plus lointaines de vos planètes, doivent travailler de concert, comme les composants d'une même machine bénie par les plus grands {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g}. Vous occupez une position qui n'a rien d'enviable et requiert une vigilance de tous les instants ! Il vous faut être {mf|attentif|attentive} et vous montrer {mf|exigeant|exigeante} envers tout le monde, vous y compris, car la moindre négligence pourrait prendre des proportions critiques. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Gerçek bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olup von Valancius protektorasında hâkimiyetinizi bir an evvel tekrar sağlamalısınız. Bu gemiden tutun da en uzak gezegenlerinize kadar emrinizdeki herkes, en faziletli {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerin{/g} kutsadığı bir makinenin parçaları gibi çalışmalı. İçinde bulunduğunuz durum iç açıcı olmayıp ihtiyatlı olmanızı gerektiriyor! En ufak hatanız, devasa bir soruna gebelik edebilir. Bu nedenle hem kendinize hem de başkalarına temkinle yaklaşınız!"
languages.original_text: "You must become a true {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} and reassert control over the von Valancius protectorate as quickly as possible. Everything — from this ship to the most distant of your planets — must work together as parts of a single machine blessed by the finest {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}. Your position is far from enviable, but that means you must be vigilant! Even the smallest oversight could grow into a huge problem, so be watchful and exacting — toward yourself and others!"

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek bir {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} olup von Valancius protektorasında hâkimiyetinizi bir an evvel tekrar sağlamalısınız. Bu gemiden tutun da en uzak gezegenlerinize kadar emrinizdeki herkes, en faziletli {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}in kutsadığı bir makinenin parçaları gibi çalışmalıdır. İçinde bulunduğunuz durum iç açıcı olmasa da ihtiyatlı olmanızı gerektirir! En ufak hatanız, devasa bir soruna gebelik edebilir. Bu nedenle hem kendinize hem de başkalarına temkinle yaklaşınız!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
